strapiJob.title: Development Coordinator
strapiJob.description: The Development Coordinator is a full-time member of the Peel Compton Foundation Development team and reports directly to the Director of Development. The position works with the Development team, employees and external constituents to promote the PCF and its mission. S/he is responsible for executing Foundation events and fundraisers to audiences within the local community. S/he solicits vendors and sponsors for all foundation events and site programming.
